attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe that the human-animal embryo bill is immoral, and should not be passed. There is no need for such a bill. As said in the cloning issue, we, humans, are not God. Therefore, we should not be allowed to tamper with life.
The eggs used may have grown to be the people who find the cure to the said illnesses. They have the same rights as us, as essensially they make us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
